definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 膠體中氫氧化鈣相對含量與膠粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: Probability of anything happening is inverse ratio to its desirability.
sentences.chinese: 一件事發生的可能懷與它受歡迎的程度成反比。

sentences.english: For dry switches, the contact resistance is inversely related to the contact area.
sentences.chinese: 對於乾式開關，接觸電阻與接觸面積成反比關係。

sentences.english: It was found that the transmissivity is inversely proportional to the incident pulse energy approximately.
sentences.chinese: 實驗發現，激光的透射率與其入射能量近似成反比。

sentences.english: That's a mistake, because v itself is a function of r.
sentences.chinese: 成反比是錯的，因爲v也是r的函數。

sentences.english: Hydrostatic pressure reacts on the efficiency of breaking rock.
sentences.chinese: 破巖效率與靜水壓力成反比。

sentences.english: Spherical divergence decreases energy with the square of the distance.
sentences.chinese: 球面擴散使波的能量與傳播距離的平方成反比。

sentences.english: If other connections are available, the amperes will vary inversely with rated voltage.
sentences.chinese: 也可採用其它電壓，但安培值將與電壓值成反比關係。

sentences.english: Fig4. Therefore, should be inverse ratio btw IQ and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 由此可見，智商和快樂成反比。

sentences.english: Bond prices and yields move in opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 債券的價格和其收益率成反比。

sentences.english: Cylindrical divergence decreases energy with the distance.
sentences.chinese: 柱面擴散使波的能量與傳播距離成反比。

sentences.english: The cross-sectional areas of the pore openings vary along their length.
sentences.chinese: 導體的電阻與其長度成正比，與其橫截面積成反比。

sentences.english: Someone may has a thought that one's beauty is inversely proportional to one's IQ.
sentences.chinese: 有些人有種觀點，一個人的外表是和智商成反比的。

sentences.english: Its significance has reduced with the game’s wider exposure on television.
sentences.chinese: 它的重要程度與比賽在電視上受關注的程度成反比。

sentences.english: The proportion of commission to be charged shall be determined according to the principle that it is in inverse proportion to the transaction price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。
